description: Deals with the acquisition of goods, services, or works from an external source.
Deals with the administration of contracts, including processes and procedures.
Covers the responsibilities, obligations, and potential legal exposures of parties.
Covers the protection of sensitive information shared between parties, including obligations, definitions, and exclusions.
Deals with rights to intangible assets, including ownership, licensing, and protection.
Covers provisions where one party agrees to protect another party from financial loss or bearing the burden of certain losses.
Covers all aspects of payment, including pricing, invoicing, late payment penalties, and payment schedules.
